channel.title: Man sues wife for being ugly - Awarded $120,000
channel.description:
Man marries wife. Man does not know wife has had US$100,000 worth of plastic surgery done in the past Man makes wife pregnant. Man disapproves of baby due to it being TOO UGLY Man accuses wife of cheating Wife confesses to plastic surgery Man sues wife for being ugly Court awards man US$120,000 for marrying ugly wife.
http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-2223718/Chinese-man-sues-wife-ugly-court-AGREES--awarding-120-000.html

item.title: Man sues wife for being ugly - Awarded $120,000
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:15, topic:465596”]Kid in teenage years, already low self confidence

  • who’s my daddy, where is he?
  • He got away for you being to ugly
    BAM amanda todd v2[/quote]

Ahah

Read full topic

item.title: Man sues wife for being ugly - Awarded $120,000
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:4, topic:465596”]Actually not nearly as outrageous as it sounds.

It’s almost like bald men wearing hats to meet women. Then when they take off their hat and the women see that they’re bald, they feel betrayed. They misrepresent themselves.[/quote]

But the women don’t sue the men for being bald…

Of course this is in China where you’re only allowed one child. With things like this happening I bet China isn’t far away from changing the DNA in embryo’s to make the ‘perfect baby’.

Read full topic

item.title: Man sues wife for being ugly - Awarded $120,000
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

Man marries wife.
Man does not know wife has had US$100,000 worth of plastic surgery done in the past
Man makes wife pregnant.
Man disapproves of baby due to it being TOO UGLY
Man accuses wife of cheating
Wife confesses to plastic surgery
Man sues wife for being ugly
Court awards man US$120,000 for marrying ugly wife.

Mail Online – 26 Oct 12

Chinese man sues his wife for being ugly, and the court AGREES... awarding him...

Jian Feng only took issue with his wife's looks after their 'incredibly ugly' daughter was born. He accused his wife (pictured) of cheating before she came clean about spending US$100,000 on plastic surgery.

Read full topic
item.source: Man sues wife for being ugly - Awarded $120,000
